mcq.statement: Mark the correct sentence: It was a cold day and many indications of snowfall. It was a cold day but with indications of snowfall. It was a cold day with many indications of snowfall.

options.a: It was a cold day and many indications of snowfall.
options.b: It was a cold day but with indications of snowfall.
options.c: It was a cold day with many indications of snowfall.
options.d: It was a cold day desire many indications of snowfall.
